org.drombler.commons.context

Class AbstractContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.commons.context.AbstractContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProxyContext, SimpleContext

    public abstract class AbstractContext
extends Object
implements Context
    A base class for Context implementations.
    Author:
    puce

    • Method Detail

      • addContextListener

        public <T> void addContextListener(Class<T> type,
                                   ContextListener<T> listener)
        Registers a ContextListener for a specified type. The listener will be notified when instances of the specified type get added or removed.
        Specified by:
        addContextListener in interface Context
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the type to listen for
        listener - the ContextListener

      • removeContextListener

        public <T> void removeContextListener(Class<T> type,
                                      ContextListener<T> listener)
        Unregisters a ContextListener for a specified type.
        Specified by:
        removeContextListener in interface Context
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the type to listen for
        listener - the ContextListener

      • fireContextEvent

        protected <T> void fireContextEvent(Class<T> type)
        Fires a ContextEvent to each ContextListener listening for instances of type type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the type that changed

      • getListeners

        protected final Map<Class<?>,List<ContextListener<?>>> getListeners()
        Gets all registered ContextListener. Note: the type parameters of entries match.
        Returns:
        a Map grouping all registered ContextListener by the type of instances they are listening for.
